name: groundsel
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a common weed (= a wild plant that grows in a place it is not wanted) with groups of small yellow flowers: Attack annual weeds such as speedwell and groundsel before they set seed. He's digging up all the groundsel.
More examplesFewer examplesHoes are a great way to weed your garden, especially if you have mainly annuals like chickweed or groundsel.Clumps of yellow groundsel grew at the edges of the fields.The plant has a sticky secretion that protects it somewhat from the groundsel.Try to stop the groundsel from flowering and seeding.
